name: Caverns of Mehillon
description:
In the Caverns of Mehillon, players take on the role of Tamzene, a dryad warrior woman on a quest to explore a complex of caverns full of monsters. 

Armed with her trusty sword and a variety of spells, Tamzene must use her agility and combat skills to navigate the treacherous caverns, battling hordes of monsters along the way. With combats in an hybrid action-text interface and secrets to discover, the Caverns of Mehillon offer a unique and challenging action-fantasy gaming experience. Every play through is different, as the monsters encountered are random, as are the events that occur.

Every play is different as most of this game is generated. You may encounter the same or different monsters on each level, so there is always something new. This game features pseudo-figurative art that stimulates imagination, and is programmed from scratch in its own game engine in C#.

Caverns of Mehillon is a casual game but you can save and load your progress if you wish to continue your adventure where you left it.

Players can create their own characters by adding images and setting stats, changing the name of the heroine if they so choose. 

There will be free and paid extensions for this game, like new levels, new adventures, and new heroines.

In this moment the game is in development (early access). It's fully playable, although there may be some bug. I say it's in development because I will add more features and extension packages.

I've set a 'pay what you want' price so you can consider it as a donation for the development of the game.

All the feedback is welcome, and all suggestions will be considered, for the development of this game. Feel free to message me or comment! :)

GAME REQUIREMENTS:
Minimal:
1280 x 800 pixels of screen resolution, Windows 10, 32 bits.
Optimal:
Bigger than 1280 x 800 screen resolution, Windows 10, 64 bits.
